svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 97px; margin-left: 25px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 129px; margin-left: 216px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #6c8ebf;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: #6c8ebf; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Extended LD block → many correlated tags

switch.text: Extended LD block → many correlated tags

div.div: Shorter LD block → recombination broke correlations

switch.text: Shorter LD block → recombination broke correlations

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 166px; margin-left: 281px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #666666;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: #666666; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Arial; color: #d62728; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 358px; height: 1px; padding-top: 270px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.b: Why PGS derived in one population transfer poorly to others:

switch.text: Why PGS derived in one population transfer poorly to others:

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 378px; height: 1px; padding-top: 320px; margin-left: 32px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. PGS weights are learned from GWAS using tag SNPs as proxies for causal variants
2. The tag-causal correlation (r²) is population-specific due to different demographic histories
3. A tag SNP with r² = 0.85 in European populations may have r² = 0.25 in African populations
4. When applied to a new population, the weights no longer capture the causal signal
5. Result: PGS accuracy degrades proportionally to the LD mismatch

switch.text: 1. PGS weights are learned from GWAS using tag SNPs as proxies for causal variants...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 273px; margin-left: 442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #b85450;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Arial; color: #b85450; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 294px; margin-left: 442px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
PGS developed in European cohorts
show ~50-80% reduced accuracy in
African ancestry populations, creating
health disparities when deployed clinically.
